txt.en:
'If you are looking for tasks, we have plenty of them, [placeholder]. The most pressing issue is probably that of our closest neighbours....

'Stíling, one of our miners, has sent back reports of a great goblin settlement too near here, unfortunately. The name of the place is Gamil Filik, and you can find Stíling there making an assessment of the threat.

'Head south from the Deep Descent and then take the east path at the cross-roads, and you should find Stíling there.'
'Well met, good [placeholder]. As you see, I have discovered some very unfriendly neighbours to the Deep Descent....'
'Stíling can be found near the goblin encampment of Gamil Filik, south and east of here.'
Thettmár has asked you to find Stíling, who has gone off to scout the eastern roadways.

Stíling is scouting the outskirts of Gamil Filik in the Silvertine Lodes, south and then slightly east of the Deep Descent.\n\nYou should speak with Stíling and offer your services against the goblin threat.
